dialogues.text: You look weak! Prove yourself worthy of my treasure!

option1.response: The Orc roars in anger. 'You’ll regret this!'

option2.response: The Orc laughs cruelly. 'Fleeing now? Pathetic!'

option3.response: The Orc grins wickedly. 'If you survive, you’ll find it among my spoils.'

dialogues.text: You dare approach me again? Let’s see if you’ve learned anything!

option1.response: The Orc snarls. 'You’ll wish you stayed away!'

option2.response: The Orc roars with laughter. 'Run, little mouse!'

option3.response: The Orc growls. 'Your words will cost you dearly!'

dialogues.text: The dragon sent me to stop you. Prepare to fight!

option1.response: The Knight raises his sword. 'This will be your final battle!'

option2.response: The Knight grins. 'Coward. You’ll regret running.'

option3.text: Try to talk your way out
option3.response: The Knight laughs. 'Words won't save you, fool!'

dialogues.text: Your journey ends here! The dragon commands your demise!

option1.response: The Knight growls. 'You’ll find no mercy here!'

option2.response: The Knight smirks. 'Running won’t save you now!'

option3.response: The Knight scowls. 'You’ll regret those words, knave!'

dialogues.text: The dragon has a bounty on your head. Time to collect!

option1.response: The Assassin moves swiftly. 'You won’t last long.'

option3.response: The Assassin smirks. 'The dragon’s always watching. Your death is inevitable.'

dialogues.text: The shadows are my ally, and your doom is certain!

option1.response: The Assassin narrows their eyes. 'You’ll regret this.'

option2.response: The Assassin chuckles. 'Running won’t spare you!'

option3.response: The Assassin smiles coldly. 'Your words mean nothing in the face of death.'

dialogues.text: You’ve wandered into my sights. Let’s see if you can dodge my arrows!

option1.response: The Archer smirks. 'You’ll regret standing still!'

option2.response: The Archer laughs. 'You can’t outrun an arrow!'

option3.response: The Archer grins. 'A lifetime of practice makes me the best.'

option1.response: The Archer nocks an arrow. 'Let’s see what you’re made of!'

option3.response: The Archer sneers. 'Words won’t save you now!'

dialogues.text: Hand over your gold, or prepare to fight!

option2.response: The Bandit jeers. 'Coward! Don’t come back!'

option3.response: The Bandit shrugs. 'A thief’s gotta eat. Your loss is my gain.'

dialogues.text: You’re in the wrong place, traveler. Let’s see what you’re worth!

option1.response: The Bandit draws their blade. 'This will be fun!'

option2.response: The Bandit laughs. 'Run all you like, I’ll still find you!'

option3.response: The Bandit smirks. 'Gold speaks louder than words.'

option3.text: Demand to know why she’s attacking
option3.response: The Witch sneers. 'Because I can, foolish one.'

option2.response: The Witch smirks. 'Flee if you like, but there’s no escape from me!'

option3.response: The Witch laughs coldly. 'Reason? How quaint!'

option3.response: The Warlock smiles. 'Knowledge is power, and you have none.'

option2.response: The Warlock smirks. 'You’ll never outrun the dragon’s wrath.'

option3.response: The Beastmaster scoffs. 'Words mean nothing to beasts!'
